subject: Football
Helmets
Sports Injuries
Concussions
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: A Virginia Tech engineer is planning to release a database rating the safety of each kind of helmet. But the issue of which helmet is safe for what kind of hit or player may not be cleared up.
snippet: A Virginia Tech engineer is planning to release a database rating the safety of each kind of helmet. But the issue of which helmet is safe for what kind of hit or player may not be cleared up.
